description: Set up a basic AWS cloud environment with VPC, subnets, and routing components
constraints: All resources must be created in the AWS us-east-1 region
Define the AWS provider with version constraints
Ensure that the VPC uses a CIDR block of 10.0.0.0/16
Create two public subnets and two private subnets across two availability zones
All resources names should have a consistent prefix 'iac-task'
Setup an Internet Gateway and route tables for public subnets
No hardcoded values are allowed; use Pulumi configuration
test_requirements: VPC created with correct CIDR block
Two public subnets in different AZs
Two private subnets in different AZs
Route tables configured for public subnets
All resources properly tagged with prefix
